Package physic

Class PhysicIdentity

java.lang.Object
physic.PhysicIdentity
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIdentity, IPhysicIdentity
public class PhysicIdentity extends Object implements IPhysicIdentity
An entity's identity which represent the physic of this entity.
